verses.roman:
saba vaiṣṇava-gaṇa hari-dhvani dila
gosāñi-dāsa āni' mālā mora gale dila

synonyms: saba—all; vaiṣṇava—devotees; gaṇa—group; hari-dhvani—chanting Hare Kṛṣṇa; dila—made; gosāñi-dāsa—of the name Gosāñi dāsa; āni'-bringing; mālā—garland; mora—my; gale—on the neck; dila—gave it.
translation: As soon as this happened, the Vaiṣṇavas standing there all loudly chanted, "Haribol!" and the priest, Gosāñi dāsa, brought me the garland and put it around my neck.
